item.title: Narae.js
item.description: narae.js is a node.js open source framework based on bean.ts for the purpose of control inversion (IoC), README Languages English (this) Korean Name “Narae” is a literary expression in pure Korean, meaning “wing”. It gives wings to developing by reducing unnecessary development and allowing more focus on business logic. Features Dependency Injection = DI Dependency injection is supported through bean.ts. Inversion of Control = IoC There are still many things that are not enough to say that it is a complete IoC.
